title: Week 4 : progressing but still getting put with fucking retards
body:
How do you expect me to climb when i get put with people who just wants to intent all the time is it it bad luck or coicidence that im being put with these types of people riot does not ban the people i report and bad enough i see them in the next game in my team and they do the same shit which is bloody unfair going on 700 rank games now and ive just been seeing the same shit every game i win good then i lose continues every bloody game. I try focus on shit im doing bad in cs, map control, team fights and obviously it does not work and i continue to gain nothing this game is bullshit...

No one in this community helps and riot does not fix the problem

Thank you for reading

Kind regards

Norbit1234 p.s a rwally pissed off lol player

replies.body: Because Riot don't care about in game behaviour unless there bot picks it up in the chat.
